angban.name: Angban
angban.description: Angban hails from the Sky Citadel of Dongun Hold, the dwarven fortress that invented frearms. At a young age, he learned the instability of black powder; as he grew older, he valued the stability it brought. At the Battle of the Warrens, he was decorated for scattering the ratfolk gunners seeking to loosen the dwarven grasp on Dongun. Through the hole in Angban’s tower shield, those ratfolk would see a solitary eye, then a muzzle ﬂash, then—if they were very lucky—a solitary eye again.

lirianne.name: Lirianne
lirianne.description: Lirianne always dreamed of becoming a shieldmarshal, like her father. With his help, she learned to draw schematics, engineer frearms, and quick-draw pistols. As a vigilant warden, Lirianne spent years safeguarding her homeland in Alkenstar… until a burst of wild magic blew in from the Spellscar Desert. The arcane catastrophe summoned bizarre creatures and struck down the only shieldwarden who stood against them. Wounded, she awoke on the shores of Avistan, where she now wanders a world far from home.

skizza.name: Skizza
skizza.description: Skizza has earned a stellar set of decorations for his actions under Dongun Hold. He was awarded the Tin Fishbone for bravely ﬂeeing his post at the Battle of the Warrens as the rest of his clutchmates were slaughtered by vicious dwarves. Then, he gained the Splotched Tunic for courageously burying only half his company when he brought the ceiling down upon the dwarves as he vacated the Kharbur Tunnel. Through his heroic actions, Skizza has taught other ratfolk the value of making the most of their stunningly brief time on Golarion.
